tutorialPages.messageText: NSLOCTEXT("[D20C99C24B2FABB4DC05E3BF1EE067C5]", "E3104B554DB070FC4B7B87AD217C7549", "You\'ve come upon a caravan in transit. Caravans are usually carrying valuable cargo between nodes. You may wish to help defend an allied caravan, or attack an enemy caravan.")

NSLOCTEXT("[D20C99C24B2FABB4DC05E3BF1EE067C5]", "32B48BAE4C028E019768BDB271E760E8", "Caravan PVP events have reduced death penalties and if the caravan is destroyed you can claim the loot for yourself! However, you\'ll need to summon your own caravan to pick it up.")
